dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to approach me, mortal? What do you seek?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek power and knowledge.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Power and knowledge, a typical desire among insignificant beings. What will you offer in return?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer my loyalty and servitude.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Loyalty and servitude, words easily spoken but rarely proven. Can you handle the darkness?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am ready to embrace the darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Embracing darkness requires sacrifice. Are you willing to sacrifice all that you hold dear?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will fight against the darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fighting against the darkness, futile but entertaining. Are you ready for the end?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer nothing but my defiance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Defiance, a feeble attempt at bravery. Are you prepared for the consequences of your defiance?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear nothing, not even you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fearlessness in the face of inevitability, amusing. Do you truly believe you stand a chance?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will never surrender to the likes of you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubbornness, a trait that often leads to downfall. Will you cling to your pride until the end?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek a way to banish you from this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Banish me? How amusing. Do you think you are the first to try such foolishness?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will succeed where others have failed.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a powerless creature. Do you truly believe you can overcome me?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will find a way, no matter the cost.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Persistent, but futile. The cost of your arrogance will be dear. Are you prepared?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand your true nature.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: My nature? You seek what you cannot comprehend. Why do you wish to know?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Knowledge is power, and I seek both.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge may be power, but power is fleeting. Can you handle the truth of your own insignificance?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am prepared for whatever truths you hold.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Preparation does not equate to acceptance. Do you truly understand the depths of your curiosity?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will uncover the mysteries, no matter the cost.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Curiosity that knows no bounds, a dangerous trait. Proceed at your own risk.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand in order to defeat you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Defeat me? Bold and foolish. Do you truly believe you are capable?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have seen through beings like you before.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Seeing through illusions is not the same as facing reality. Will you face the reality of your own limitations?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will find your weakness and exploit it.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Weakness, a concept you understand well. But can you recognize your own before it's too late?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek nothing from the likes of you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Nothing? How intriguing. Why do you stand before me then?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I stand before you to end your existence.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Boldness to the end. Do you truly believe you can end what you do not comprehend?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not rest until you are no more.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Rest is a luxury you cannot afford. Will you embrace the darkness you so despise?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will banish you from this realm for the safety of all.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Safety? A noble cause, but can you truly ensure it? Are you willing to pay the price?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to witness the end of an era.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An end of an era? You speak in riddles, mortal. Are you prepared for the consequences of your words?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I speak truth, and truth will prevail.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Truth is subjective, and reality is cruel. Can you face the truth of your own existence?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The era of shadows will be no more, mark my words.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold declarations from a mere mortal. Will you face the shadows without flinching?
